name: CHICKEN DINO RUN
description:
Welome to the CHICKEN DINO RUN! The chickens have been seperated and they need to go back home to their coop. Help the chicken gather up his friends together and escape the clutches of the rampaging Dinasaurs! Move the chicken by  use the keys "W | A | S | D" To jump use the "SPACEBAR" .........................GOOD LUCK!.........................

ALL MUSIC FROM:https://opengameart.org

PROGRAMMER: 🇸 🇶 🇺 🇮 🇷 🇹 🇱 🇪#5218

PIXEL ARTIST: Charry#0194
